Today in Pembrokeshire, surf is looking solid at 5 ft @9s WSW with fresh 17 mph SW winds. Best spots include Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay, both offering fun peaks. Tomorrow, conditions drop slightly to 4 ft @10s with a lighter 15 mph S wind, still workable at the same locations. By the day after, expect 3 ft @9s WSW with light 8 mph WNW winds, making for a cleaner session. Best: today.
